net_worth.Name: Net Worth
net_worth.Description: The total value of your cash and assets minus your debt, calculated once per session.

total_minutes.Name: Playtime
total_minutes.Description: The time played on this character

minutes_by_job.Name: {Job} Playtime
minutes_by_job.Description: The total time played as a {Job}
minutes_by_job.ExtraDescription: The time played for each job

kills_by_weapon.Name: {Weapon}
kills_by_weapon.ExtraDescription: The number of kills by weapon

deaths_by_weapon.Name: {Weapon}
deaths_by_weapon.ExtraDescription: The number of deaths by weapon

headshot_rate.Name: Headshot Percentage
headshot_rate.Description: The percentage of your kills that are headshots. This has been introduced in version 0.3.306, previous activity was not recorded, and the percentage is calculated based on the kills performed after the update. You need at least 30 kills after the update for this value to show up.

total_spent_on_health.Name: Total Spent on Healthcare
total_spent_on_health.Description: Total spent on medical bills. This stat was added in 0.3.202, previous activity was not recorded.

total_spent_on_bail.Name: Total Spent on Bail
total_spent_on_bail.Description: Total spent on bail fees. This stat was added in 0.3.201, previous activity was not recorded.

tickets_paid.Name: Tickets Paid
tickets_paid.Description: Number of tickets you have paid

tickets_contested.Name: Tickets Contested
tickets_contested.Description: Number of tickets you have successfully contested

tickets_refused.Name: Tickets Refused
tickets_refused.Description: Number of tickets you have refused

scratch_cards_won.Name: Scratch Cards Won
scratch_cards_won.Description: Total number of scratch cards won

wanted_level_gained.Name: Wanted Level Gained
wanted_level_gained.Description: The number of wanted level stars gained in total

holdups.Name: Stores Robbed
holdups.Description: The total number of store roberies in which you participated

money_robbed.Name: Total Made From Store Robberies
money_robbed.Description: The total amount of money earned from robbing stores

safes_cracked.Name: Safes Cracked
safes_cracked.Description: The total number of safes cracked

jewelry_stores_robbed.Name: Jewelry Store Robberies Initiated
jewelry_stores_robbed.Description: The total number of jewelry store robberies you initiated

jewelry_stores_robbed_success.Name: Jewelry Store Robberies Completed
jewelry_stores_robbed_success.Description: The number of jewelry store robberies that you successfully completed

jewelry_items_stolen.Name: Jewelry Items Taken
jewelry_items_stolen.Description: The total number of items successfully stolen during jewelry robberies

arrests_resisted.Name: Arrests Resisted
arrests_resisted.Description: The number of successful attempts to resist arrest

bounties_claimed.Name: Bounties Claimed
bounties_claimed.Description: The total number of bounties claimed

total_money_from_bounties.Name: Total Made from Bounties
total_money_from_bounties.Description: The total amount of money earned from killing players with a bounty

bounties_lost.Name: Bounties Survived
bounties_lost.Description: The total number of bounties you survived

total_lost_bounty_money.Name: Survived Bounties Total Value
total_lost_bounty_money.Description: The total value of survived bounties

npcs_pickpocketed.Name: NPCs Pickpocketed
npcs_pickpocketed.Description: The total number of NPCs pickpocketed

players_pickpocketed.Name: Players Pickpocketed
players_pickpocketed.Description: The total number of players pickpocketed

total_money_from_pickpocketing.Name: Total Made from Pickpocketing
total_money_from_pickpocketing.Description: The total amount of money made from pickpocketing

stores_shoplifted.Name: Items Shoplifted
stores_shoplifted.Description: The total number of items shoplifted

total_shoplifting_value.Name: Value Shoplifted
total_shoplifting_value.Description: The total value of shoplifted goods

atms_hacked.Name: ATMs Hacked
atms_hacked.Description: The total number of ATMs hacked

total_atm_hack_money.Name: Total Made from Hacking ATMs
total_atm_hack_money.Description: The total amount of money earned from hacking ATMs

officers_bribed.Name: Officers Bribed
officers_bribed.Description: Total number of bribes successfully given to police officers

officers_bribed_money.Name: Total Spent on Bribes
officers_bribed_money.Description: Total amount of money spent on bribes

total_money_from_exports.Name: Total Made From Exporting
total_money_from_exports.Description: Total amount of money earned from vehicle exports

bonus_exports.Name: Most Wanted Vehicles Exported
bonus_exports.Description: Total number of most wanted vehicles exported

total_money_from_scraps.Name: Total Made From Scrapping
total_money_from_scraps.Description: Total amount of money earned from vehicle scrapping

sales_npc_total_money.Name: Total Made from Sales to NPCs
sales_npc_total_money.Description: Total money earned from selling to NPCs

sales_npc_by_job.Name: {Job}
sales_npc_by_job.Description: Total sales to NPCs as a {Job}
sales_npc_by_job.ExtraName: Total Sales to NPCs by Job
sales_npc_by_job.ExtraDescription: Total sales to NPCs by job

sales_npc_by_job_money.Name: {Job}
sales_npc_by_job_money.Description: Total money earned from selling to NPCs as a {Job}
sales_npc_by_job_money.ExtraName: Total Made from Sales to NPCs by Job
sales_npc_by_job_money.ExtraDescription: Total money earned from selling to NPCs by Job

sales_npc_by_item.Name: {Item}
sales_npc_by_item.Description: Total amount of {Item} sold to NPCs
sales_npc_by_item.ExtraDescription: How much of each item was sold to NPCs

sales_players_total_money.Name: Total Made from Sales to Players
sales_players_total_money.Description: Total money earned from selling to players

sales_players_by_job.Name: {Job}
sales_players_by_job.Description: Total sales to players as a {Job}
sales_players_by_job.ExtraName: Total Sales to Players by Job
sales_players_by_job.ExtraDescription: Total sales to players by job

sales_players_by_job_money.Name: {Job}
sales_players_by_job_money.Description: Total money earned from selling to players as a {Job}
sales_players_by_job_money.ExtraName: Total Made from Sales to Players by Job
sales_players_by_job_money.ExtraDescription: Total money earned from selling to players by Job

sales_players_by_item.Name: {Item}
sales_players_by_item.Description: Total amount of {Item} sold to players
sales_players_by_item.ExtraDescription: How much of each item was sold to players

sales_players_by_service.Name: {Service}
sales_players_by_service.Description: Total amount of {Service} sold to players
sales_players_by_service.ExtraDescription: How many of each service were sold to players

police_takedowns.Name: Takedowns
police_takedowns.Description: Total number of players taken down

police_tickets_money.Name: Total Made from Tickets
police_tickets_money.Description: Total amount of money earned from giving tickets

police_arrests_by_wl.Name: Wanted Level {WL} Arrested
police_arrests_by_wl.Description: Total number of players with {WL} stars arrested
police_arrests_by_wl.ExtraDescription: How many arrests per wanted level

police_takedowns_by_wl.Name: Wanted Level {WL} Taken Down
police_takedowns_by_wl.Description: Total number of players with {WL} stars taken down
police_takedowns_by_wl.ExtraDescription: How many takedowns per wanted level

police_calls.Name: Calls Responded to
police_calls.Description: Number of calls responded to and went to the scene location

police_seizures_by_item.Name: {Item}
police_seizures_by_item.ExtraDescription: How much of each item was confiscated

police_bribes_accepted_money.Name: Total Made from Bribes
police_bribes_accepted_money.Description: Total amount of money earned from bribes

paramedic_calls.Name: Calls Responded to
paramedic_calls.Description: Number of calls responded to and went to the scene location

mechanic_tows.Name: Vehicles Towed
mechanic_tows.Description: Total number of vehicles towed to an impound lot

hitman_contracts_completed.Name: Hit Contracts Completed
hitman_contracts_completed.Description: Total number of hit contracts completed

hitman_contracts_completed_money.Name: Total Made from Hit Contracts
hitman_contracts_completed_money.Description: Total amount of money earned from hit contracts

hitman_contracts_deaths.Name: Deaths from Hit Contracts
hitman_contracts_deaths.Description: Number of deaths caused by hit contracts completed by other hitmans

hitman_contracts_survived.Name: Hit Contracts Survived
hitman_contracts_survived.Description: Total number of hit contracts that you survived

hitman_contracts_survived_money.Name: Survived Hits Total Value
hitman_contracts_survived_money.Description: The total value of your survived hit contracts. This stat was added in 0.3.201, previous activity was not recorded.

ddriver_deliveries.Name: Deliveries Completed
ddriver_deliveries.Description: Total number of delivery jobs completed

ddriver_total_made.Name: Total Made from Deliveries
ddriver_total_made.Description: The total amount of money made from delivery driving

ddriver_deliveries_canceled.Name: Total Deliveries Canceled
ddriver_deliveries_canceled.Description: The number of deliveries that you have canceled

ddriver_deliveries_lost.Name: Delivery Goods Lost
ddriver_deliveries_lost.Description: The number of deliveries that were canceled due to loss of goods
